ValidationRule.description: Client Approved for Development can only be true when Status is Pending. This checkbox is set automatically by the approval workflow when client approves a Backlog task.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Client_Approved_for_Development__c = TRUE, TEXT(Status__c) != "Pending", OR( ISCHANGED(Client_Approved_for_Development__c), ISCHANGED(Status__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Client Approved for Development can only be true when Status is Pending. This checkbox is set automatically by the approval workflow when a Backlog task is approved.
